body.name: 2024 Newest 11 inch Tablet Android 13 Tablets 16GB RAM 256GB ROM 1TB Expand, 2K 2000 x 1200 Display, Octa-Core, Triple Camera, 8600mAh, Quad Speakers, 5G/2.4G WiFi, GPS,Bluetooth,with Case -Rose Gold
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 7 hrs 56 mins
features: 【11 Inch In-cell 2K IPS Display】: The 11 inch tablet is equipped with an 2K FHD in-cell Touchscreen. 2000 x 1200 resolution offers higher pixel density for more detailed images and truer color reproduction, making movies more stunning. 16:10 screen ratio and wide color gamut provide a more realistic visual experience. 466g weight with 6.8mm metal body combines better feel and portability features.

【16GB (8GB+8GB Virtual) RAM 256GB ROM and Powerful CPU】: The tablet builts in 16GB (8GB physical + 8GB virtual) RAM and 256GB ROM with up to 1TB of TF card expansion support. Stores tons of movies, music, eBooks and more. Equipped with MediaTek MT8183 2GHz octa-core processor. Four powerful Arm Cortex-A73 "big core" and four Cortex-A53 cores and powerful Arm Mali-G72 level graphics processor. Can easily meet the needs of reading, gaming, working and so on.

【Android 13 and Dual Band WIFI Tablet】: This 11-inch tablet is powered by the latest Android 13 OS with a more beautiful UI and more useful features. And it pays more attention to privacy and security. Adopting 802.11ac standard, which covers both 5GHz and 2.4GHz bands at the same time, providing faster network and stability. Support split-screen function like watching TV and reading at the same time. Supports Bluetooth 5.0 and GPS.

【8600mAh Battery and Quad Speakers】: The 8600 mAh battery tablet pc lets you enjoy the entertainment such as watching videos, reading, gaming, browsing the web, listening to music and more. The Quad speakers provide more three-dimensional sound, higher quality of music and video. More clearer and brighter. Reduces problems such as resonance and distortion.

【13MP Camera and Other Function】: The tablet comes with 3 cameras. 5 MP front camera, 13 MP main camera and 2 MP macro camera. Provides better shooting experience and higher image quality. Pre-installed with Google kids space, parents can control the tablet's usage rights, time limit and so on through google family link. Provide 1+1 year warranty, please feel free to contact us for 24 hours technical support.
body.description: 2024 Newest X800 11 inch Tablet, Android 13 OS, 16(8+8)GB RAM, 256GB ROM, 1 TB Expanded Micoro SD Card memory, GMS Certified, 2000x1200 IPS Display, 5g/2.4g WiFi Tablet, with Case. Specification: OS: Android 13 without Ads CPU: Octa-Core, 2.0GHZ RAM: 16GB ( 8GB Physical + 8GB Virtual ) RAM ROM: 256GB Storage External Storage：Support up to 512GB Micro SD Card ( Not inluded ) Connection: 2.4Ghz + 5Ghz WiFi, Bluetooth 5.0, Hotspot, FM Resolution: 2000x1200 Hardware Configuration: Screen Size: 11 inch Interfaces: Type C port, Micro SD Card slot, Mic supported Camera: 13MP + 2 MP Rear and 5MP Front Battery: 8600mAh Package includes: 1. 11 inch Tablet with Case 2. Charging Adapter with Type C Cable 3. 3-layer Screen Protector 4. Well-designed Box 5. User Manual After-sales Service: AOCWEI has a professional service team to deal with all kinds of problems. If you have any problem please feel free to send us Amazon Message, we will reply within 24 hours and give you satisfactory solutions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unleashing Power and Precision: The Surprise Android 13 Tablet Experience
reviews.reviewText: The Android 13 Tablet is not just a device; it's a portal to a new dimension of technology. I recently had the pleasure of experiencing this 11-inch marvel, and it left an indelible impression.Let's dive into the powerhouse of this tablet — a whopping 16GB of RAM and a capacious 256GB of internal storage. This alone elevates the tablet into the upper echelons of performance. Opening apps, multitasking, and handling demanding processes felt like a breeze. And, the expandable storage option up to 1TB ensures that you practically have a digital universe at your fingertips.The display is a visual symphony. Whether I was engrossed in a movie, editing photos, or reading an e-book, the clarity and vibrancy were consistently impressive.Performance-wise, the Octa-Core processor ensured a seamless experience. Navigating through apps, gaming, and even handling resource-intensive applications felt like a walk in the park. This tablet is a true workhorse.The camera setup is worth a shout too. A Triple Camera system captures moments with clarity and detail for a tablet.The 8600mAh battery is a marathon runner. It not only lasts all day under regular use but also handles power-hungry tasks without breaking a sweat.The audio experience is equally impressive with Quad Speakers. Whether you're watching movies, gaming, or listening to music, the sound quality is immersive. The placement of the speakers adds a spatial dimension to the audio, creating a truly engaging experience.Connectivity options are exhaustive. With 5G capability, 2.4G WiFi, GPS, and Bluetooth, you are always connected, no matter where your adventures take you. The inclusion of a case is a thoughtful touch, providing protection without compromising the tablet's sleek design.In conclusion, the Android 13 Tablet is a testament to technological excellence. It seamlessly combines power, precision, and versatility in a sleek 11-inch frame. This is not just a tablet; it's a statement. If you're in the market for a device that pushes boundaries and redefines what a tablet can be, the Android 13 is your answer. It's a journey into the future of technology, and the future looks brilliant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible quality for this low price!!!!
reviews.reviewText: We really love the AOCWEI tablets, we have bought quite a few of those over the past years. We are always satisfied, the products are reliable and great for the price!We just bought this new 11-inch X800 tablet. The packaging is nice, and contains all the necessary equipment: charger and plug of course, screen protection (easy to install), case and a micro-SD card opener! Since our daughter enjoys taking lots of pictures that feature will probably be useful.The case is very convenient as always and offers a great protection against accidental drops, with additional layers on the corners.Pics look really nice; the cameras quality improve at every release! And the screen resolution is also quite amazing regarding the price of this tablet. Audio is just fine too I’ve been watching TV series and really enjoyed the experience.Setup is a piece of cake. We always use a parental control App, and after a few minutes, the tablet was ready to go!After a few days of use, Android 13 runs great: fast, no bugs, just as it should.Our daughter really loves it and wouldn't be back to her previous one 🙂When you consider the price vs quality ratio of this tablet, you can only be amazed! I strongly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smart design, lightweight. Lots of storage space
reviews.reviewText: I’m partial to iPhones but I don’t mind android tablets. This one delivered early, instructions tell you to make sure it’s 100% charged before turning on, this one was “in the red” but charged quickly. It’s loaded with everything google. Easy to use, camera was easy to access, the case is just a folio, but it’s decent, has a rubbery textured grip surface inside & out. Great deal for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice balance of features
reviews.reviewText: First off -- This tablet is speedy! When used side-by-side with another tablet I own, this one was always faster at loading webpages. Also, the ability to choose whether it was going to be used by an adult or a child, was a smart option.The icons and text were too small at first, but they were easily enlarged (much better!).The clarity of the screen is great! Battery is good -- it's been 3 days now, and still not needing a charge.One of the other features I really like are the multiple speakers. The quad speakers are exactly what I've been needing in a tablet. All other tablets I've owned have required the use of an additional bluetooth speaker when trying to watch something and sit more than a foot away. (I'm old - my hearing is fading). But not this tablet, it's probably the feature I like the most.It was also very nice to have the screen protection already installed. No messing with air bubbles, being placed on straight, etc. Just peel off the outer layer, and it was ready to go. Although a little note on the tablet screen might have helped me figure that out sooner than I did.Speedy, good battery usage, crystal clear screen, super loud speakers -- overall a great value for the money.All in all -- it's a very good set of specs for the price.
